seedGroups.name: Shattering
seedGroups.description: Shattering seeds can be tough to visually judge for ripeness. Use a *gentle* touch test to see if the seeds easily loosen.

species.description: Shattering. This ephemeral plant forms delicate mats along the ground, especially in wet to mesic woodlands. Subtle blooms are easy to overlook, and the entire plant disappears by summer. Test seed ripeness with a *gentle* touch test. Collect 10%.
